statements: UPDATE images_and_reports SET report='Normal findings' WHERE image_id=1;
UPDATE images_and_reports SET diagnosis='Pneumonia' WHERE image_id=2;
UPDATE images_and_reports SET diagnosis = 'Normal', report = 'No issues found' WHERE image_id = 12345;
UPDATE images_and_reports SET report = 'Abnormalities detected', diagnosis = 'Hypertension' WHERE patient_id = 54321;
UPDATE patients SET date_of_birth = '1990-03-15', gender = 'M' WHERE patient_id = 1
UPDATE medical_records SET record_type = 'Checkup', notes = 'Routine checkup performed.', record_date = '2021-09-20' WHERE record_id = 5
UPDATE patients SET gender = 'M', date_of_birth = '1990-10-15' WHERE patient_id = 101
UPDATE medical_records SET notes = 'Patient recovered fully from the illness' WHERE record_id = 201
UPDATE Patient_Images SET image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE Diagnostic_Reports SET doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith', report_text = 'Patient condition stable' WHERE patient_id = 3;
UPDATE Patient_Images SET timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', privacy_level = 'Private' WHERE image_id = 100;
UPDATE Consultation_Logs SET consultation_duration = 45, consultation_notes = 'Patient showed improvement' WHERE patient_id = 200 AND log_id = 15;
UPDATE patients SET image_url = 'new_image_url' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE doctors SET location = 'New Location', specialization = 'New Specialization' WHERE doctor_id = 2;
UPDATE patients SET patient_name = 'John Doe', diagnostic_report = 'Complete report generated.' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE virtual_consultations SET consultation_notes = 'Follow-up required after 7 days.' WHERE consultation_id = 3;
UPDATE Patient SET patient_age = 30 WHERE patient_id = 1
UPDATE Image SET image_data = '0x52494646' WHERE image_id = 3
UPDATE Patient SET patient_age = 35, patient_name = 'John Doe' WHERE patient_id = 101
UPDATE Image SET image_data = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE image_id = 201
